price: Je, hawa sio wale mlio kuwa mkiwaapia kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu hatawafikishia rehema. Ingieni Peponi, hapana khofu kwenu, wala hamtahuzunika!
arabic: أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقۡسَمۡتُمۡ لَا يَنَالُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِرَحۡمَةٍۚ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: Hao wanyonge mlio kuwa mkiwadharau, na mkaapa kuwa hayumkini Mwenyezi Mungu awateremshie rehema, kama kwamba nyinyi ndio mnao ishika rehema yake, wao wamekwisha ingia Peponi! Na Mola wao Mlezi atawaambia: Ingieni humo kwa amani. Hapana khofu juu yenu kwa jambo lolote litalo kupateni, wala hamtahuzunika kwa jambo mlilo likosa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ahāulāi alladhīna aqsamtum lā yanāluhumu al-lahu biraḥmatin ud'khulū al-janata lā khawfun ʿalaykum walā antum taḥzanūna
